comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/535.7 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/16.0.912.63 Safari/535.7

Steps to reproduce:

I have god idea - Animated Image API.
var img = new MozAnimationAPI(image);
img.getFrame(number); - get data URI of frame
img.getComputedFrame(number); - get data URI of APNG frame with blend = 1
img.getFrames(); - get frame array

This need for works with APNG and GIF file format.
